headline: Parker-Hannifin Expands Filtration Reach As Valuation And Guidance Draw Focus
summary: Parker-Hannifin (NYSE:PH) has agreed to acquire Filtration Group Corporation, expanding its presence in life sciences, HVAC, and industrial markets. The company reported record quarterly sales alongside strong organic growth in key segments. Management raised full-year guidance following the Filtration Group announcement and the latest quarterly results. Parker-Hannifin enters this transaction from a position of strength, with record quarterly sales and what management describes as solid...
